member.name: T:Color
member.summary: Before use this module, Please import first: import "Mods\Color" The EV3 Color Sensor module made by OFDL Taiwan.

member.name: M:getID
member.summary: Get EV3 Color Sensor Color ID.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getLight
member.summary: Get EV3 Color Sensor Reflect light value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getAmbient
member.summary: Get EV3 Color Sensor Ambient light value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getRaw
member.summary: Get EV3 Color Sensor Reflect Light raw value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getRGBW
member.summary: Get EV3 Color Sensor Color RGBW value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.

member.name: M:getHSVL
member.summary: Get EV3 Color Sensor Color HSVL value.
member.param: The port (1~4) you connect to device.
